sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛...➛First name,

 

Thank you for golfing with us.

Hole 1 Trigger➛...➛Hole 1 Strokes
Hole 2 Trigger➛...➛Hole 2 Strokes
Hole 3 Trigger➛...➛Hole 3 Strokes
Hole 4 Trigger➛...➛Hole 4 Strokes
Hole 5 Trigger➛...➛Hole 5 Strokes
Hole 6 Trigger➛...➛Hole 6 Strokes
Hole 7 Trigger➛...➛Hole 7 Strokes
Hole 8 Trigger➛...➛Hole 8 Strokes
Hole 9 Trigger➛...➛Hole 9 Strokes


 Sincerely,

The Golf Club

The Golf Club
